R

register(String, ServerHandler) - Method in class networking.server.Server
 
Request - Class in networking.types
This class contains the number of the request,
which is actually not in use right now,
the Object which is being buffered,
and the name of the request (see Requests)
Request(String, Object) - Constructor for class networking.types.Request
 
Request(String, Object, int) - Constructor for class networking.types.Request
 
Requests - Enum in networking.server
 
Response - Class in networking.types
This class contains the number of the response,
which is actually not in use right now,
the Object which is being buffered,
and the name of the response (see Responses)
Response(String, Object) - Constructor for class networking.types.Response
 
Response(String, Object, int) - Constructor for class networking.types.Response
 
Responses - Enum in networking.server
 
run() - Method in class networking.server.ServerHandler
Connectivity Check First of all it checks if the server is already closed
and if that's true it closes the Handler
Deserialization First it checks if the queue is empty.
run() - Method in class networking.server.ServerThread
